title: A Tribute to James Cagney. 'Great guy'. 'Blood on the sun
brief_description: Great guy - ex prizefighter Cagney wages a war against graft and corruption in the food business by using the mob’s own methods to beat them. Stars James Cagney and Mae West. “Blood on the sun” - In the Twenties, the American editor of a Tokyo newspaper reveals a Japanese militarist plan for world conquest.
